Reviews.Title: “Perfect choice”
Reviews.Author: StellaRapti
Reviews.Content: Excellent location, fairly clean, very good breakfast, reasonable price. It has no great view, but the rooms are big and comfortable. But most of all, the stuff helped us with my medicall condition so much, that I felt that I was in my own country. I called for an abulance twice, and there was no charge for the medical aid that I received! The hotel covered all expences! Further more, they helped me so much to find a pharmacy and take my medication in the middle of the night, that I can't be too thankfull. Thank you again for the beautiful vacation and the help through this rugh time. This hotel will be my definite choice in case I visit Istanbul again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: steveAsserballeskov
Reviews.Content: Brilliant location with shopping, bars and restauarants everywhere. You are only a few minutes walk from the funicular railway which will take you down to the harbour where you can catch the different ferries. The hotel has a bistro restaurant which is international in style, not great but acceptable food. My room was one of the modernized ones and although a bit small it was well equipped and furnished. The breakfast was average. The service in the hotel was excellent in all aspects. Will definitely use again.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap and elegant”
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very close to the main trouristic street of Istanbul (istiklal), and all the touristic places. People working there are very helpful. They also have a bus that takes you from and to the aiport, free of charge! We stayed in the renovated part of the hotel. The room, although small, is very clean, elegant, and comfortable. You need no car to go around the center of Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location for a perfect trip”
Reviews.Author: Denny I
Reviews.Content: Very modern hotel with very helpful service! It is just around the corner of Taksim square, a perfect location especially for couples-very close to bars and restaurants. It is also connected with a tram line so all the sightseeing places that you would like to see (it is a must in my scenario) are on your reach-Easy :)

Reviews.Title: “Question”
Reviews.Author: ElenitaP
Reviews.Content: hello we are about to visit istanbul next month and our travel agency proposes to us to stay at peak hotel.....i see above at the comments that the standard rooms are old enough....is this still true or is there any renovation??? thank you....

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel at the center of great Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: MarkoIYP
Reviews.Content: A really beautiful hotel with great service. Nice rooms, well-equipped, I even had a welcome message with my name on the TV screen. Some reviews say that room maintenance is not very well, but it was good. The room and the bathroom were cleaned thorough every day. The hotel is in the center of the city, so everything is close by - Istiklal street (1 minute walk), Galata tower, and the bridge leading to the Asian part of Istanbul is just some 15 minutes walking from the hotel. The choice of dishes for breakfast is fabulous. Istanbul is a city I'll return to and I hope I will be in Peak hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Center of beautiful Istanbul.. beyond my expectations”
Reviews.Author: Elham K
Reviews.Content: Before going I was actually little worry specially when I read some review about this hotel and the cleaning there, but when I arrived I was so surprised.. cause I had nothing to worry about in the opposite side I was so happy .. more and more than I expected. The taxi arrived in the hotel, so I saw that the hotel was one of the hotel in main street and near the sea.. in same time just few steps from Istiklal street. So every thing is just around you.. shops, cafes, restaurants, bookstore, gift shops.. every thing. If you want to go in any other area it is easy to walk from inside the small streets or just take a taxi .. I loved his location. Actually I was really worried, so I remember I was asking many question when I arrived in the hotel reception. Someone took my bag to the room and he was very friendly showing me the options that I had in my room. I was in a renovated room, it was really beautiful with modern design. In bathroom, you can find an inspiring quote written on the shower glass. every thing in the bathroom from soap, shampoo.. even brush teeth. In the room, coffee and tea for free and if you want to take any thing from refrigerator it is extra.. but there prices was good. Also safe box was available in room, many things actually I was happy with my room. It was beyond my expectations :) and I loved it.. but I don't know about other rooms (not renovated), I was with group of people and all of them had same renovated room and was happy about it like me. I was in the 7th floor side room, so I had the view of other roof buildings with Istanbul sky and Istanbul sea from the side .. it was OK with me. I was just happy with my room. I was in hotel for 5 days and cleaning services came every day. They were good actually. Hotel staff was very friendly, also the hotel breakfast open buffet was very delicious and lot of varieties with Turkish food and intercontinental one. Peak Hotel.. Definitely I'm going again! :)

Reviews.Title: “Great location and good buy”
Reviews.Author: Cagdastraveler
Reviews.Content: Great and excellent location would definetky come back

Reviews.Title: “GREAT LOCATION”
Reviews.Author: NAGIA94
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel for three nights and it was ok. The room was clean and spacious brekfast was excellend ,and the location too.

Reviews.Title: “Old and worn-down room”
Reviews.Author: KarinSl
Reviews.Content: The Peak Hotel advertises with newly renovated rooms, but the standard rooms are definitely not renovated anywhere recent. My room was small and the bathroom was quite old. The carpet was pretty dirty and the wall tiles in the bathroom were covered in tiny brownish spots. I was not too happy about the view, until I noticed on the floor plan that my room (402) is probably the only room on the floor with a decent view. The mattress was very, very hard. On the bright side: breakfast was OK (although fresh orange juice will cost you extra) and wifi is very good.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, small rooms but great value”
Reviews.Author: MTaylor218
Reviews.Content: I visited the peak hotel a month ago for with my fiancÃ©e for an Istanbul city escape... I booked the hotel through their website and I was surprised by the low rate compared to the quality of the rooms through the website's photo gallery and its great location (right down town next to everything...). However, I disappointed by the rude receptionist, that never smiled and seemed like he did not like us. Moreover, the room was tiny but we did really care cause we only used it to sleep, cause Istanbul needs 18hours a days of exploration... If you don't mind a small room and just want a nice hotel with a great location, I would recommend it, otherwise check elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Highly Recommended!”
Reviews.Author: Soozanne2011
Reviews.Content: Excellent! The rooms were clean, the beds comfortable, the staff were friendly, and the breakfast was fantastic....plenty of variety and plenty of it! Brilliant location. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great location, friendly staff, dirty room”
Reviews.Author: ev_mine
Reviews.Content: pleasant stay. The room was quite good even though there was some stains on the walls and had a theme with the heating. We couldn't heat the room even though the heat was on all the time (and was noisy too). The breakfast was very good and nothing was really missing. The staff was pleasant and always helpfull.

Reviews.Title: “Dissapointed”
Reviews.Author: G_T_F_S
Reviews.Content: We choosed the hotel based on some reviews I had read on various sites. It was the best value for money (I thought)).. My first impression was very bad!!. They gave us a room too small and old. At the same time, other couples with the same money took double in size and renovated rooms. After continuous complains, director finally changed our room and guess what......, they gave us a room with two separate beds and not a double . And when I complained again he told it was not possible to change us room a second time (while there were available rooms with double bed. I know this because next day friends of us moved to a room with double bed). Cleanliness??? The friends I already told you, moved to another room because the bathroom had stains! And when my wife checked more thorough... she also found stains! Of course we complained and the next day everything was clean. Positive: a) It is located 15 minutes from Taxim and 1 minute from Istiklal b) the breakfast is good enough c) It has free WiFi in the rooms. Let me add that another couple had a rectangular room with two beds one after another in the series. I attach photo pf the 1st room and the 2nd room.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: ollielollie
Reviews.Content: Loved the location, voluminous breakfast. Room a bit cramped.

Reviews.Title: “All just acceptable!!”
Reviews.Author: kos_kal
Reviews.Content: The hotel is placed about 10-15 minutes on foot by Taksim Square. Offers only the basics as fas as it concerns the rooms. It's renovated but not at all. Toilettes aren't renovated, but clean enough. Plenty of choices in morning buffet!! Recomended for those who want only the basic!!!

Reviews.Title: “Dishonest reception staff!”
Reviews.Author: weary_traveller062
Reviews.Content: Beware, of a scam at this hotel. On check-in, was told by reception staff that I had been up-graded to a deluxe room and there would be no charge for the mini bar. On check out, was told in an aggressive manner that I was in a standard room and the mini bar changes would be debited from my credit card. Also, air con was antiquated and very noisy Hotel was otherwise fine, good location, clean and tidy

Reviews.Title: “Well placed hotel but terrible rooms”
Reviews.Author: MariaCarme55
Reviews.Content: Terrible rooms with dirty walls, we had to change room because of the noise of his bar; Be carefull with the rooms... we were with group and realized that there are two class of rooms: the new rooms (like you can see at internet) and the old rooms who are dirty and decadent, like we stayed. The recepcionist not very nice.

Reviews.Title: “basic hotel, negative personnel”
Reviews.Author: bluecatHelsinki
Reviews.Content: Hotel is situated in a good postition in Pera. It is basic (we stayed in standard room) and the breakfast was ok, but not memorable. The hotel was clean and served its basic purpose as a place to rest and sleep. The personnel - especially some of them - was quite negative, no smiles. If there was some problems, they assumed that the client was doing something wrong or was complaining for no reason. Perhaps they tried to be very efficient or modern, but the impression was negative. However, if we missed towels, we were quickly brought new ones, so all service was not bad.

Reviews.Title: “good location, good value”
Reviews.Author: O_Xenos
Reviews.Content: medium-sized hotel, good room and services, conveniently located. The cashier had a hard time helping to change currency. Free internet provided, working well; which I believe is a must nowadays.

Reviews.Title: “Recommended”
Reviews.Author: JanneS6
Reviews.Content: Well, it was my first stay in Istanbul and yes, the Peak hotel is still going to be THE place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: fairlady07
Reviews.Content: Perfect location for nightlife, shopping and transport system. Historical sights within easy reach. Modern hotel very clean and comfortable. Staff courteous and friendly. We had an executive room which is the type shown on their website. Some of the other rooms did look small. Breakfast was very good with plenty of choice to suit most travellers. Tea and coffee facilities in room which was a bonus. Would definitely stay here again if coming back to Istanbul

Reviews.Title: “Rude and unfriendly”
Reviews.Author: GaryMuc
Reviews.Content: For business reasons I stayed at the hotel for more than a week. The stuff in the hotel is the most unfriendly and unhelpful is have ever experienced. You have to beg for everything to fix they did wrong. There has never been any excuse for their mistakes - as ignoring requested rooms, extending the room keycard, correcting the bill etc. The breakfast room is completely full of guests at morning peak times where you have big difficulties to find a space. The waiters ignore requests to clean up tables, to bring coffee or to fill up the buffet. They switch off lights before closing time and remove things at that time as well. Check your bill carefully as they don't really care what they charge. I changed rooms several times because they tried to give me a lower category than booked (and paid). English language skills are very poor either but they don't really try to explain things to you or take you serious.

HotelInfo.Address: Mesrutiyet Cad Oteller Sok 1/3 | Tepebasi, Istanbul 34430, Turkey
